lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court rejected a bid to free Barry Bonds’s personal trainer, who was jailed for refusing to testify to a grand jury, but the court did not end his appeals. A three-judge panel of the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit on Thursday sent Greg Anderson’s contempt case back to United States District Judge William Alsup to decide a key issue.
